name: Pathfinder (Hammad K)
description:
Pathfinder is a text adventure game. Use your mouse to select what you want to do or say.

Created for the Patient73 Jam

Tools used:

  • Engine: Unity 2020 + Rider
  • Art: Cinema 4d, Photoshop
  • Music & Sound: Ableton Lite + Audacity
  • Libraries: DOTween & Ink
